column4: Can anyone help me with 9.10 freezing like 10 times a day requiring a hard reset?
Upgrade to Lucid 10.04 and see if that still occurs?
i really dont feel like doing that
Make a final /important/ backup then "do-release-upgrade -d"  -- Not too hard. :)
in order to upgrade, id have to wipe this harddrive and reinstall the new one, i really dont want to, i dont have enough space to back anything up
Use GIMP + Compiz. Ok ok. Use Photoshop... but rainmeter is meh? Calendar, right?
ive got like 3 years expericance with photoshop, and i just cant seem to figure gimp out
thats all eww like and stuff
You only like Rainmeter because it is... easy to set up? ;o
hardly, it took me like a week to get it to my liking
You can greatly free up the space by purchasing more storages. It's efficient method.
indeed it is, but i am jobless and have no money
